# Commercial data

```{r list_com, include=FALSE}
com_pages <- list.files(here::here("docs/Commercial landings"), pattern = ".html")
```

These reports are a preliminary analysis of commercial data only.

```{r}
purrr::map(com_pages, 
           ~paste(beginning_of_link, "esp_data_aggregation/Commercial landings/", 
                  .x, "'>",
                  stringr::str_split_fixed(.x, pattern = "_", n = 2)[,1] %>% 
                    stringr::str_to_sentence(), 
                  "</a>", sep = "")) %>%
  unlist() %>%
  knitr::kable(col.names = "Species name")

```
